mapper.select: SELECT CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_CD, -- COMPLEX CODE CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX_S_NM, -- COMPLEX SUB NAME LATI_POS, LONG_POS, UNIT_CNT, -- 개수 ADDR, ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 ADDR1, ADDR2, LOC1_NM, LOC2_NM, LOC3_NM, POST_NO, IMG_SRC, MAP_SRC, LOGO_IMG_SRC, -- LOGO IMAGE SOURCE MNL_SRC -- ?? FROM COMPLEX_M WHERE COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' ;

SELECT CMPLX_ID, CMPLX_CD, -- COMPLEX CODE CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX_S_NM, -- COMPLEX SUB NAME LATI_POS, LONG_POS, UNIT_CNT, -- 개수 ADDR, ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 ADDR1, ADDR2, LOC1_NM, LOC2_NM, LOC3_NM, POST_NO, IMG_SRC, MAP_SRC, LOGO_IMG_SRC, -- LOGO IMAGE SOURCE MNL_SRC -- ?? FROM COMPLEX_M WHERE CMPLX_ID = #{cmplxId} AND COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' ;

SELECT CMPLX.CMPLX_ID, GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE AS CMPLX_GRP, CMPLX.CMPLX_NM, -- COMPLEX NAME CMPLX.ADDR, -- 일반 주소 CMPLX.ADDR_DTL, -- 상세 주소 CMPLX.ADDR1, CMPLX.ADDR2, CMPLX.CL_MAP_SRC, -- CommonLife's Map Src/Url CMPLX.CL_LOGO_IMG_SRC -- CommonLife's LOGO Image Source FROM COMPLEX_M AS CMPLX LEFT JOIN -- TODO: 확장테이블인 COMPLEX_M_EXT의 레코드가 없기 때문에 임시로 LEFT JOIN 함 COMPLEX_M_EXT AS CMPLX_EXT ON COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_ID = COMPLEX_M_EXT.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_M AS GRP ON GRP.CMPLX_ID = CMPLX.CMPLX_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLEX_GRP_TYPE_M AS GRP_TYPE ON GRP.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID = GRP_TYPE.CMPLX_GRP_TYPE_ID
WHERE COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_GB_CD = 'AD01102' -- # CommonLife현장 == 'AD01102' ORDER BY COMPLEX_M.CMPLX_NM ASC ;
